bluej.codecoverage.utils.serial

Class CoverageBridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • bluej.codecoverage.utils.serial.CoverageBridge

  • public class CoverageBridge
extends java.lang.Object
    Extracts needed information from Jacoco's coverage, and turns it into a serializable representation.

    ikingsbu

    • Method Detail

      • toSerializable

        public static CoveragePackage toSerializable(org.jacoco.core.analysis.IPackageCoverage pkg)
        Turn each class in the package into our representation and return it in a package.

        First it converts all Jacoco's ClassCoverage objects into CoverageClass, then performs a merge on all of the gathered class level coverage information.
        The merge is required because Jacoco returns a different ClassCoverage for every class, included nested classes.
        While Jacoco's ISourceFileCoverage returns only 1 element per file, like we want, it lacks information like method locations.

        Parameters:
        pkg - the Jacoco object to transform
        Returns:
        our representation of the Jacoco object.

      • merge

        private static java.util.List<CoverageClass> merge(java.util.List<CoverageClass> classes,
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,org.jacoco.core.analysis.ISourceFileCoverage> sourceCoverage)
        Merges all class level coverage information, so there is 1 CoverageClass per source file.

        This is done by finding the CoverageClass objects whose class name matches the name of the source file.
        Once those are filtered all remaining classes are added as children to the CoverageClass that has the same source file name.

        Parameters:
        classes - the list of CoverageClasses to merge
        sourceCoverage - Map of package + source file name to the coverage for a source file.
        Returns:
        reduced list of CoverageClasses, with 1 per source file.

      • findName

        private static java.lang.String findName(CoverageClass inner)
        Finds the class name of an inner class.

        By Default the class name for an inner class is ParentClass$1 for Anonymous classes, and ParentClass$ChildClass for nested classes.

        Parameters:
        inner - the class to find the name for
        Returns:
        the correct name.

      • toSerializable

        static CoverageClass toSerializable(org.jacoco.core.analysis.IClassCoverage clz)
        Converts the Jacoco IClassCoverage into CoverageClass.

        CoverageClass contains coverage information for the class, as well as a list of methods, and a list of CoverageClasses, in the case of nested classes.

        Parameters:
        clz -
        Returns:
        Serializable form of code coverage information for a class.

      • fillBase

        static void fillBase(org.jacoco.core.analysis.ICoverageNode src,
            Coverage dest)
        Fills in the coverage information that is common to all types.
        Parameters:
        src - the Jacoco object
        dest - our representation of the jacoco object.
